message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and your interest, I believe it's only fair to present it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $10,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This price reflects the value I see in it and would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of this, I am willing to consider a price of $9,000 for the product. This still represents a premium value, but I hope it aligns better with your budget while maintaining a reasonable profit margin for me.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $9,000 is closer to my budget, I'm still hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.  I'm prepared to offer $8,750 for the product. This price is fair considering the value I see in it and my financial limitations.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've considered your latest offer and am willing to accept $8,900 for the product. This price respects your budget while still providing a good return on my investment. I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both parties.
